list.abs: every row , column and region must contain the dights from 1 to 9.The value in the top left corner of a colored area corresponds to the difference the biggest dight of this area and the small one ( s ) .将1-9填入空格，使得每行、列、九宫格都含1-9，每个框的左上角的数字表示该框内最大数与其他数字的和的差

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: past participle of archaic dight 'order, deal with', based on Latin dictare 'compose (in language), order'. The wide and varied use of the word in Middle English is reflected dialectally
